thread.title: Top South Korean officials depart for U.S.

title: Top South Korean officials depart for U.S.
text:
Top South Korean officials depart for U.S. 10:46am GMT - 00:36 
A South Korean delegation that was in Pyongyang for talks earlier this week departs for the U.S. to meet with top officials there. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
